alert.note: Alert for Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:18PM CDT until July 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WINNEBAGO COUNTY... At 918 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rockford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Cherry Valley and Winnebago. This includes... Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, and Rockford Speedway. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 8 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
